excerpt: "SamurAI uses two on-chip sub-systems: a low-power clockless event-driven wake-up controller which can start up in 207 ns, and an on-demand subsystem comprising a RISC-V CPU with deep sleep mode plus PNeuro AI accelerator and cryptography accelerators."
